about_the_game:
During a sleepover with your friends, you found yourself in Mama's dream! Mama is very hungry, so it's up to you to venture out into her subconscious and find cursed objects to feed her. Be careful, though, as the curses affect you! They may induce hallucinations, spawn a new plague, or even conjure corporeal pursuers....

But that's great news! Mama loves to eat curses—the worse the curse, the more her love grows! (Along with her appetite) As long as Mama is satiated, her angels get to keep searching for guns and masks that cause permanent bodily changes. Don't worry about Mama starving, though; she'll just eat you before that happens!

Mama dreams of neighborhoods, sewers, endless foggy halls, inverted hanging superstructures, and a myriad of beings with ulterior motives.

You may come to her dreams with different people over time, but if you've met some of the dream's talkers before, and especially if you've emotionally impacted them, they will remember you and treat you accordingly. Not all entities will offer the goodwill of friendship, so be a good judge of character.

Don't worry too much about death, as friends can lend a helping hand by decapitating your corpse, allowing your spirit to roll your head back to Mama's Altar. Whether alive or dead, at Mama's Altar, you can communicate with friends out in the dream via your flip phone. Moreover, you can use your Personal Computer to guide them through areas of the dream, identify hazardous locations, and alert them when Mama starts to wake up!

content_descriptors.notes: Players die in cartoonishly depicted gruesome and violent ways. Monsters are gory. Statues of the female figure are present but featureless, no nipples, no genitals, no faces, etc.
